script.line: What the-- It didn't work!
Impossible! Minty must be so bereft of civic responsibility that it had no effect!
Bark! Bark!
Hey Prota. You still need help?
Teens! You're back!
Ah. Speaking of "bereft of civic responsibility"...
Not so, Mayoress! We're here to lend a hand.
We stand behind the mayoral office 100%!
What? Shouldn't you... hate following the rules?
Oh, we do. It's for nerds.
But we also think demons are dope.
Yeah, Mayoress, you're metal AF.
Language!
Ugh, it means "at fighting". That's why we're here to help.
We went and got everything we need. Candles. Crystals. Chalk.
What are those for?
How do you not know about this? It's obviously so we can perform the Sacrament of Strength.
You know about that?!
Duh. Sure, we skipped our mandated Security City courses...
But we loved our time at the Summoning Township.
...Very well. Prota: stand back.
Bark, bark?
Verus tempus est hic...
Quod oriri et daemonium ...
Et hoc capite canem!!
Rrraaaggh! I am imbued with the power of community leadership!
MINTY...
Bark?!
You have engaged a power the likes of which you cannot understand...
EN GARDE!
